pr_title: Do not create empty schemas in HiveQueryRunner

timeline.message: Do not create empty schemas in HiveQueryRunner
Do not create empty schemas in HiveQueryRunner

timeline.bodyText: maybe instead the q runner should create some other schema to be used for tests that do not need tpch?
timeline.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: It looks like it requires not that trivial refactor of HiveQueryRunner. I will leave as it is for now.
replies.author: kokosing
